resources.string: Keyboard height, horizontal offset and vertical correction of keys and Autocomplete
First turn on and activate the keyboard!\n(the first paragraph of Settings)
This is an independent application that contains different languages and layouts. There you can also find the instruction (on Russian) for creating your own layout and language.
This is an independent application that contains different skins. There you can also find the instructions for creating your own skin.
The \"Autocorrect\" and \"add a space after characters\" features have been enabled (in Autoinput).\n\nThey are not working properly together!
After each update, the keyboard needs to be unloaded from memory, otherwise its behavior will be unpredictable.

There are no extraneous activities in the keyboard application, nothing is collected or stolen!
This is a standard system warning. For more details, see \“How to use the keyboard\” 

For a proper work, the application requires some permissions, WITHOUT ANY OF THEM, THE KEYBOARD WILL NOT WORK:

- access to read and write to Internal Sorage (for the work of custom dictionary, templates, external layouts, skins and other stuff used in the keyboard).

- window type \“On top of other windows\” (for the work of Autocomplete (word prediction), keystroke display and some dialog boxes).

For the work of Autocomplete (word prediction), keystroke display and some other windows (dialog boxes, keystroke display, etc), the program requires the window type permission \“On top of other windows\”.

In case you, for some reason, have been denied permissions, and their request no longer appears, then, permissions can be granted through the system settings of the Jbak2 keyboard application. The \"Permissions\" and \"On top of other windows\" items
Not all required permissions have been allowed
Long press on the Filter button: turn the filter on/off
Set image as a background. The keyboard app will use more memory
Out of memory!\nCannot use this image as keyboard background
0: fully transparent, 10: transparency of skin. It only makes sense if you use a background image
Enable the keyboard via the notification panel. Sometimes it is necessary
You can disable this notification going to Other settings
Still in beta. These settings apply only to the first version of the small keyboard (i.e. when the popupCharacter tag is not v2).
If checked, its own small keyboard is used, otherwise the default one will be used
Key size in the small keyboard
Character size on keys of the small keyboard
Background sync of multi-clipboard entries, after a specified time interval.

It is used to automatically save a specified number of first entries from the multi-clipboard into the "save.txt" file, in the Jbak2Keyboard/save_clipboard folder on SD card, periodically, after a specified time interval.

If:
- the save_clipboard folder does not exists, it will be created.
- this service is enabled, the program will require more memory.
- the first entry in the multi-clipboard has the same date as the date of the last save, the recording will not start.

It is not required to use.
Time interval in minutes (to record clipboard data):\n(the higher the frequency of recording, the higher the load on the processor, and the slower the program works)\nBy default: 24 hours
Show the Sync button in the multi-clipboard?
Overwrite the file or create a new file with creation date.
What is the maximum size of entries (in kilobytes) to be saved into file?\n(to reduce freezes on low-power devices)
Number of entries to be saved.\nIf the value is greater than a set number of entries in the multi-clipboard, the entire multi-clipboard will be saved.
It will run when you first open the keyboard
Previous program execution ended with an error.\n\nWould you like a send report to the developer?
Please, do not delete the information below. It will help fix the error faster.\n

(scrolling text is on)

Read "How to use the keyboard"? (On low-power devices, it can take more time to display the text)

This keyboard is professional, completely customizable and differs from most other keyboards.
For this reason, it does not have predictive text input and Swype function.
Initially, the keyboard is set up according to the principle "turn on and use".
Before you change advanced settings, read the text, it contains answers to almost all your questions.

This professional keyboard is fully customizable and differs from most other keyboards.
This is a keyboard constructor with huge possibilities.
For this reason, the keyboard does not have predictive input and and Swype function.

The warning about a possible theft of passwords is a standard system message. For more information, see "How to use the keyboard".

If you have a device with a MIUI ROM, by default the autocomplete box (where you can see word suggestion) and the keypress pop-up feature will be turned off. To turn them on, read How to use the keyboard.

The Xiaomi manufacture has been detected: by default, some windows will not work on your device (Autocomplete, keystroke display, some confirmation messages before actions, etc), be sure to read “How to use the keyboard”

Mark the languages you want.
Then, in front of each language you can find the "Select layout" button. Click on it.
It will open a screen to select layouts. Scroll layouts using right and left arrows.
After selecting the one you like, do not forget to click the \ "Save " button.
Repeat the same operation for each selected language.
Select skin.\nAfter selecting, press the \"Save\" button.
To enable the Autocomplete box, you need to install the dictionaries for the selected languages.\n\nDownload a dictionary installer application?

For a more detailed configuration, read "How to use the keyboard", there are answers to almost all your questions .

Open?

(It can take a long time to open on low-power devices)
Restart the application to apply the changes

(the scrolling text feature is available)

You can edit a word or change its frequency by clicking on this word or its frequency accordingly.
Press Enter to finish editing.
Long press on a word will delete it from the dictionary, and the word itself will be colored with red.

The higher is the word frequency, the closer is a word to the top of list, if the list of AutoComplete is given by frequency.
Frequency range of words from 0 to 10000000.
The word frequency above 500000 indicates that the word was not in the main dictionaries, and it has been added by the user, and it needs to be shown at the top of the list (that is why it has such a large number).
If the frequency of a word is set to 0, its frequency will not increase, and it will not appear in the word list (words from the main dictionary have a minimal frequency set to 1, that is why they will be always displayed).
If a parameter value is incorrect, the input field will turn red
ℹTap the color wheel to pick a color
ℹTap the color rectangle to pick a color
Gradient start color for key background
Gradient start color for key background in a pressed state
Gradient final color for key background in a pressed state
Bold font (1) or not (0). If it is not set, the regular font will be used
Text color in a pressed state
Character color in a pressed state
Indent size of key background (in pixels) from the full key rectangle
Gradient start color for key stroke
Gradient final color for key stroke
Gradient start color for key stroke in a pressed state
Gradient final color for key stroke in a pressed state
Gradient start color for keyboard background
Gradient final color for keyboard background
Text color in a pressed state
Additional character color in a pressed state
Gradient start color for key background
Gradient final color for key background
Gradient start color for key stroke
Gradient final color for key stroke
Gradient start color for key background in a pressed state
Gradient final color for key background in a pressed state
Corner radius of key rectangle on the X axis, if it is not set - 9
Corner radius of key rectangle on the Y axis, if it is not set - 9
Gradient type of keys in a pressed state. 0 - linear, 1 - radial
Save the string with additional characters to a separate file
Load the string with additional symbols from a single file
Set colors of keys in Autocomplete

Color is specified in hexadecimal format - #aarrggbb, or 0xaarrggbb, (the case of characters is inconsiderable) where:
aa - transparency (00 - fully transparent, ff - fully opaque)
rr - red
gg - green
bb - blue.
Text color of additional keys:\n(by default #ffffffff)
Background color of additional keys:\n(by default #ff444444)
String from settings for Additional gesture
If checked, after pressing a key, the small keyboard pop-up will stay open\n\n
ℹ If there are a lot of keys, the scroll box will be available
Down Arrow from the Autocomplete box
If checked, \"Down Arrow\" is not showing in Autocomplete. It is possible to use a gesture instead of it

If checked, when you click on the separator character (.,?! ,etc) in Autocomplete, the word where the cursor is located will be not replaced, and this character will be inserted at the cursor position
Number of words in the drop-down list. The higher value is chosen, the slower will be the process
Action cannot be executed.\nWord does not exist in a custom dictionary
If checked, words in the drop-down list will be sorted in alphabetical order, otherwise, by frequency of use

It is convenient to enter the key code by turning on Key code display (in Appearance) in AutoComplete. It is necessary press the key for which you create a gesture and ,then, click the button of the pressed code.
If one key corresponds to many characters, will be taken the first one.

Code 32 (space) has been reserved!

After you specify all the parameters, click the Save button
Gesture direction\n(the gesture will work only if the layout has at least one key in the direction to the gesture after the selected key):
To the left from the key
To the right from the key
Selection mode switcher(the Select button must be present on the keyboard layout)
The number of spaces depends of the gesture length
To the beginning of the text
To the end of the text
To the beginning of the paragraph
To the end of the paragraph
Delete the word before the cursor
It is required to have at least one key below the spacebar
To open the special character pop-up using the \"Special characters\" gesture, it is necessary to list them here
Search for copied text in your browser
Search for selected text in your browser
Making a list of appropriate applications
Switch between the TextEdit and qwerty keyboard
Switch between the calculator and qwerty keyboard
Switch between the emoji and qwerty keyboard
Switch between the numeric and qwerty keyboard
Favorites\npress on text: launch the application
All\nshort keypress: launch the application,\nlong keypress: add to Favorites
Select items to show on the main menu
Long press on the menu item button: delete
Program memory is empty. Nothing to output
Memory of the calculator is not empty.\nRewrite?
Arrow key behavior to the right/to the left
If it is on, when you reach the end of the text, the cursor will be moved to the beginning of the text and vice versa
Where to display the keypress pop-up
All colors are set to 0: black, 255: white
Words listing for pop-up keyboards (if they are available in the selected layout)
Format: #[Hi, Joe]#[mailto:]\nwill display 2 buttons (and it will input the text after pressing them) - Hi, Joe and mailto:
For example, if the \"Rate this app\" request is appearing too frequently, just increase the delay time
If some characters can not be pressed (or do not work properly), increase the value
Please, rate this app (via settings),\nand this message will never be shown again.
Do you like the keyboard?\nPlease, rate the app, and this request will no longer appear.
\n(it can take a long time to open on low-power devices)
Check configurations and 99% of your questions will disappear
Download of dictionaries (without them Autocomplete will not suggest words) and their configurations
Autocomplete WILL NOT WORK without downloaded dictionaries
Two-letter language code to make Autocomplete work. Words will be added to the custom dictionary
By choosing a word from Autocomplete, you will increase its frequency of use by one count. Over time, the most common words will be always displayed on the screen.
Dictionary training will be faster, but with a higher CPU load. It only works together with the previous configuration.
Change the icon on the Enter key depending on the context?
Words in Autocomplete by default. Separator: space. If one key corresponds to many characters, will be entered the first one.
Default Autocomplete string has changed. Do you want to change it to a new one (cannot undo changes)?
Insert space after a word selected from Autocomplete
Text length in the CURRENT input field\nTurn on Autocomplete to display.
Turn on Autocomplete to display.\nMore details on\"How to use the keyboard\".

Short press on the menu item will enter the specified value indicated on it, long press will copy the number to the clipboard

---
Turn it off, if you do not want to see keypress pop-up previews
Height and offset in portrait mode
Change the keyboard height and offset in portrait mode
Rotate the screen to portrait mode
Height and offset in landscape mode
Change the keyboard height and offset in landscape mode
Rotate the screen to landscape mode
Select layouts and languages for switching (You can change the default layout)
If enabled, the screen will vibrate on long keypress
If enabled, the screen will vibrate on repeated keypresses (for example, when you are holding down the backspace key)
If enabled, the keys will vibrate when the device is set to silent mode
Play system sounds on each keypress
Volume of all sounds (works only on some devices, on others it remains by default)
Key vertical correction to improve keypresses
the five boxing wizards jump quickly

Your vertical correction is: %1$d.
 System value is: %2$d

 Do you want to save?
Some settings for the automatic input
If enabled, upper case will be activated in empty text fields
Rules for automatic toggling between upper and lower cases
Rules for the uppercase text transition
If enabled, all spaces (if they are there) will be deleted after the characters listed in the following configuration
If enabled, all spaces will be deleted before the following characters. Click to edit
Automatic uppercase after characters. See the next setting
Uppercase will be activated after entering the following character. Click to edit
Switch to uppercase after a space and after one of the characters from the previous setting
Automatic space adding after the following characters. See the next setting
Space will be added after entering the following characters. Click to edit
Before entering one of these characters, a space will be inserted. Click to edit.
Enables space adding before entering some of these characters listed in the following configuration
Select fullscreen editor in portrait mode
Select fullscreen editor in landscape mode
Fullscreen mode does not always work (depends on the application where the input has made)
Font settings of input fields in fullscreen mode
Font for text labels (language,Select,Copy and other keys)
Keyboard appearance and fullscreen editor settings (skin selection, additional tools, font installation, character size etc.)
Maximum number of items in the multi-clipboard
If checked, the path to the current folder will be displayed in the menu of Templates and other menus
Where to display the Autocomplete box?
Apply current suggestion after adding a space or after an other punctuation mark input
+ to the left, - to the right
- to the left, + to the right
Long press on the buttons to the right/left to open the list
Not fully ready yet. Try later

ℹ If there are a lot of keys, menu scrolling will be available.
(the keys from the right side will be scrollable too).

A long press on the menu item (in the right places) opens the item editor.

It is possible to perform various file operations with templates and calculator programs, using a file manager. Each template (calculator program) is a regular file where the template name is a file name
The path to the template folder or calculator program displays at the top of the menu screen.
Set size of text keys (By default 15)
Set text size of service keys (By default 8)
\n(It will be shown, when the external skin is on use)
Display the Autocomplete box\n(It works, only if the Autocomplete box is above the keyboard)
Two letter code (ru, en, etc) of the translator interface language in a browser
Copied number in different number systems
Dictionary temporary disabling (only the default string is displaying)
What is the base notation of the number
Number must be an integer, positive and less than 10 characters (decimal)
Not supported for your version of Android
File already exists.\nDo you want to replace it?
Data has been changed.\nDo you want to save changes?
All fields must to be filled out!
Do you want to clear the clipboard ?

string-array.name: tpl_spec_instructions
string-array.item: $select - instruction will be replaced by the text of the current selection
$selword - if nothing is selected, the instruction will be replaced by the word that is above the cursor, otherwise, it will be replaced by the selected text
$selline - if nothing is selected, the instruction will be replaced by the current paragraph, otherwise, it will be replaced by the selected text
$$ - it will be replaced by the $ sign
$datetime - the current date and time will be inserted. If the cursor is located at the word, it will be replaced
$sellowercase - converts all letters to lowercase in the selection
$selupcase - convert all letters to uppercase in the selection
$selinsertword - inserts selected character or word between symbols in the selection
$selDeleteWord - removes a specified character or word in the selection
$seltranslit - transliterates Russian language characters into Latin characters in the selection
$selVerseMode - verse mode: each first character of the string in the selection will be capitalized
$selAsInTheSentences - letter case in the selection like in the sentences
$paste - pastes the current value from the clipboard

string-array.name: tpl_insertsymbol
string-array.item: [] - your value (you can write a phrase in parentheses)

resources.string: This special instruction will probably not work everywhere or will not work properly, all depends on the application where the input is made

string-array.name: datetime_format
string-array.item: [] - your own format (all formats are described in \"How to use the keyboard\")
